alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Chesterfield; Clarendon; Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lee, southeastern Calhoun, western Clarendon, south central Chesterfield, Sumter, northeastern Orangeburg, southeastern Richland and central Kershaw Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Wateree Dam to 8 miles northwest of Oakland to 6 miles east of Eastover to 6 miles southeast of Gadsden to near St. Matthews. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Camden, Manning, Bishopville, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, St. Matthews, Summerton, Elloree, Oakland, Santee State Park, Mulberry, Westville, Alcolu, Cassatt, Elliott, Lee State Park, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, and Poinsett State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 95 and 125. Interstate 26 between mile markers 139 and 141. Interstate 95 between mile markers 100 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Chesterfield; Clarendon; Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter
